channel.title: Hands on Labs on My blog
channel.description: Recent content in Hands on Labs on My blog

item.title: Brilliant idea: VMware Hosted Beta
item.author: yourname@example.com (yourname)
item.description: Duncan Epping rather unceremoniously published a blog post «New Beta Program offering: VMware Hosted Beta» yesterday, outlining the availability of the new hosted beta offering that companions some of the current VMware beta programs. _Due to the very NDA nature of the beta programs, I can´t really go into details on what is currently offered, but what I can say is this: Well done VMware!_ The VMware Hosted Beta runs on the same engine that runs the VMware Hands on Labs Online – Beta, but with a little added twist.
